FuncDef:
The service rate-limit-mode user-queue command configures a rate limit mode for EDSG service traffic.
The undo service rate-limit-mode command deletes a rate limit mode configured for EDSG service traffic.
The default rate limit mode is CAR.
CLIs: undo service rate-limit-mode [ user-queue ] { inbound | outbound }

ParaDef.Info:
Sets a rate limit mode for EDSG service traffic to user-queue.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a rate limit mode for EDSG service traffic in the upstream or downstream direction, run the service rate-limit-mode command.
Configuration Impact
After the service rate-limit-mode command is run, the configured rate limit mode is used for EDSG service traffic of users who go online from the AAA domain.
